hero_description:
Web developer specialized in designing and developing websites and e-commerce stores
Frontend: React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap
Backend: Laravel, PHP, Node.js, MySQL
Platforms: Shopify, Wix, Zid - RTL/LTR Support
work_movies_des: A movie search application that allows users to search for movies, view details, and explore popular films using the OMDB API.
work_leaves_des: A leaf recognition app that identifies different types of leaves using image processing and machine learning techniques.
work_restaurant_des: A restaurant website featuring a menu, reservation system, and contact information with a visually appealing design.
work_arino_des: Responsive website template for agencies and businesses to showcase services, projects, and connect with clients.
work_portfolio_des: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experiences with a clean and modern design.
work_description: Check out some of my work
skills_subtitle: Professional tools and frameworks for building high-quality web solutions
about_subtitle: Specialist in building integrated web solutions with a focus on performance, quality, and precise details
about_description_1: Full Stack Web Developer specialized in designing and developing websites and e-commerce stores with a focus on performance and user experience. I work on platforms like Shopify, Wix, and Zid, implementing landing pages, informational websites, and integrated, responsive web projects across all devices.
about_description_2: On the front-end, I have strong expertise in React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap to design modern, organized, and user-friendly interfaces. I'm deeply passionate about user experience, website performance, and precise design implementation that serves the brand and visual identity.
about_description_3: On the backend, I've worked with Laravel and PHP, building authentication systems, user management, CRUD operations, and database connections using MySQL, while maintaining clean code and following best practices. I also have knowledge of Node.js and Strapi for building dynamic websites, APIs, and supporting multilingual content.
about_description_4: In Shopify, I fully customize themes, adjust language and direction (RTL/LTR), and develop custom sections using Liquid, CSS, and JavaScript, while improving store speed, SEO, and integrating external services and applications. I always focus on clean code, precise details, and building practical solutions that make it easy for clients to manage their projects and deliver professional user experiences to end-users.
aboutTextCV: Full Stack Developer with strong experience building modern interfaces using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with Tailwind and Bootstrap, and developing backend systems with Laravel, PHP, and Node.js, including MySQL database integration. Focused on performance, user experience, and clean code following best practices.
edu1: Delta Higher Institute for Computers and Information ‚Äì Mansoura
freelance1: Developed landing pages and custom sections for Shopify stores.
freelance2: Built multi-language websites using React and i18next.
freelance3: Customized Wix, Shopify, and Nicepage stores based on client needs.
freelance4: Implemented sliders, forms, and interactive sections using pure CSS and Liquid.
